title: Simeone warns Atletico to stay humble after extending winning run
description: Diego Simeone urged his Atletico Madrid players to stay grounded in the midst of their 14-game winning run that moved them to the LaLiga summit on Sunday. Atletico leapfrogged rivals Real Madrid in the standings following their 1-0 victory over Osasuna, with Julian Alvarez’s second-half goal enough to seal the triumph.
